name: The HOT
description:
You are the HOT.

You are a planet.

A very special, one-of-a-kind planet with the ability to create Energy from nothing!

That’s right, no more Big Freeze. Move over Heat Death of the Universe. You’re here to save the day with your Heal Over Time powers.

Travel the universe to find fading planets and lend them a steaming cup of fresh brewed Energy.

Entropy be gone!

Made in one week for 7DFPS 2022 by Ikiru and Tonic of oldflowerGames.

  • Real time, tick-based combat where all damage and healing happens over time. Symmetrically balanced powers place an emphasis on timing and planning over power creep.
  • Atmospheric music, awesome icons, and in-key sound effects make for an smooth ride.
  • Inspired by the feeling of having a poison effect and a heal over time active simultaneously and trying to figure out if your net HP is increasing or decreasing.

Follow us here and/or sign up for our newsletter to keep up to date with our upcoming projects! http://eepurl.com/hqoUkL
